content: If you want to renew an automatic login using {{organizationName}} {{productName}}, you will be asked to grant access to your {{productName}} account data.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the action of revoking consent for automatic login access to account data in a product. When used in a RevokeDialog, it appears as a message explaining why user consent needs to be granted again for renewal, prompting users to authorize data access for their account.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "профила ви в {{productName}}" (your profile in {{productName}}) doesn't accurately convey the intended meaning of "account data" in the English text. 'Данни от акаунта ви в {{productName}}' or 'данните на вашия {{productName}} акаунт' would be more accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ако искате да подновите автоматичното влизане с помощта на {{organizationName}} {{productName}}, ще трябва да предоставите достъп до данните на вашия {{productName}} акаунт.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "χρησιμοποιώντας το {{productName}} της {{organizationName}}" translates to 'using the {{productName}} of {{organizationName}}'. This implies a possessive relationship, which might not be the intended meaning. It would be more natural to express it as 'using {{productName}} from {{organizationName}}' or 'using {{productName}} provided by {{organizationName}}'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εάν θέλετε να ανανεώσετε μια αυτόματη σύνδεση χρησιμοποιώντας το {{productName}} από την {{organizationName}}, θα σας ζητηθεί να χορηγήσετε πρόσβαση στα δεδομένα του λογαριασμού σας {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of "{{productName}}" at the end of the sentence feels awkward. The English version only mentions the product name once.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εάν θέλετε να ανανεώσετε μια αυτόματη σύνδεση χρησιμοποιώντας το {{productName}} από την {{organizationName}}, θα σας ζητηθεί να χορηγήσετε πρόσβαση στα δεδομένα του λογαριασμού σας.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "մուտք գործել ձեր {{productName}} հաշվի տվյալները" is an awkward and inaccurate translation of "grant access to your {{productName}} account data." It literally means "enter your {{productName}} account data."  A more natural and accurate translation would imply granting permission.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Եթե ցանկանում եք թարմացնել ավտոմատ մուտքը՝ օգտագործելով {{organizationName}} {{productName}}, ձեզանից կպահանջվի համաձայնել ձեր {{productName}} հաշվի տվյալներին մուտքի իրավունքը:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '을/를' is unnecessary and grammatically awkward in this context. It indicates a choice between two particles but doesn't fit the sentence flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{organizationName}} {{productName}}을 사용하여 자동 로그인을 갱신하려면 {{productName}} 계정 데이터에 대한 액세스 권한을 부여하라는 메시지가 표시됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ກ່າວວ່າຕ້ອງ" (said that you must) sounds awkward and overly formal. It doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'will be asked'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຖ້າທ່ານຕ້ອງການຕໍ່ນະໃສ່ການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບອັດຕະໂນມັດໂດຍໃຊ້ {{organizationName}} {{productName}}, ທ່ານຈະຕ້ອງໃຫ້ການອະນຸຍາດເຂົ້າເຖິງຂໍ້ມູນບັນຊີ {{productName}} ຂອງທ່ານ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation uses "zostaniesz poproszony(na)". This implies the user's gender is known, which isn't appropriate for a generic message. The form should be gender-neutral.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: zostaniesz poproszony lub poproszona o przyznanie dostępu / zostaniesz poproszony/poproszona o przyznanie dostępu / zostaniesz poproszony/poproszona o przyznanie dostępu (note: double parentheses can also be used to show both options, but this can be visually unappealing). Alternatively, use a gender-neutral wording.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'przy użyciu {{productName}} {{organizationName}}' could be improved for clarity. It's not immediately obvious what 'przy użyciu' means in this context. It sounds slightly awkward.  The structure should mirror the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: przy użyciu {{organizationName}} i {{productName}} / z wykorzystaniem {{organizationName}} i {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'autentificarea automată' (automatic authentication) is slightly awkward. While technically correct, 'logare automată' would be more natural and commonly used in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dacă doriți să reînnoiți logarea automată cu ajutorul {{organizationName}} {{productName}}, vi se va cere să acordați accesul la datele contului dvs. {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ස්වයංක්‍රීය உள்ප්‍රවේශය අලුතින් සකසන්නට අවශ්‍ය නම්" (swayaṅkriyā ulpravēṣaya alut̄hin sakasan̄ṇata ḍanyā nam) is not the most natural way to express 'renew an automatic login'. A more accurate translation might focus on 're-establishing' or 're-enabling' automatic login.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබ {{organizationName}} {{productName}} භාවිතයෙන් ස්වයංක්‍රීය உள்ප්‍රවේශය නැවත සකසන්නට අවශ්‍ය නම්

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ඉල්ලීමක් කෙරේ" (illīmaḻ kamē) is a bit formal and stiff. A more conversational translation for "you will be asked" would be more appropriate.

The phrase 'grant access' is translated as 'odobriti dostop', which is technically correct but sounds slightly formal and less natural in Slovenian for this context. A more natural phrasing might be 'ponovno potrditi dostop' or 'ponovno dovoliti dostop'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'grant access' as 'ponovno potrditi dostop' or 'ponovno dovoliti dostop'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation retains the double curly braces `{{...}}` which are likely meant to be replaced with actual values. This is a formatting issue that needs to be addressed before deployment.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the double curly braces `{{...}}` from the translated text.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "відновити автоматичний вхід" (restore automatic login) is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be something like "повторно авторизуватися" (re-authorize) or "оновлювати автоматичний вхід" (renew automatic login) although the latter is less common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Якщо ви захочете повторно авторизуватися за допомогою {{productName}} {{organizationName}}, вам буде запропоновано надати доступ до даних вашого облікового запису {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, repeating '{{productName}}' feels slightly redundant. Depending on context, it might be clearer to omit the second instance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Якщо ви захочете повторно авторизуватися за допомогою {{productName}} {{organizationName}}, вам буде запропоновано надати доступ до даних вашого облікового запису.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'grant access' is a bit clunky in Vietnamese. A more natural phrasing would be 'đồng ý cho phép truy cập' or 'đồng ý cấp quyền'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nếu bạn muốn gia hạn đăng nhập tự động sử dụng {{productName}} {{organizationName}}, bạn sẽ được yêu cầu đồng ý cho phép truy cập vào dữ liệu tài khoản {{productName}} của mình.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "续订自动登录" (xùdìng zìdòng dēnglùn) translates more accurately to 'renew automatic login' but can sound a little awkward in Chinese. A more natural phrasing would be '重新启用自动登录' (chóngxīn yǐnqián zìdòng dēnglùn) or '重新设置自动登录' (chóngxīn shèzhì zìdòng dēnglùn).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using '重新启用自动登录' (chóngxīn yǐnqián zìdòng dēnglùn) or '重新设置自动登录' (chóngxīn shèzhì zìdòng dēnglùn).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word '权限' (quánxiàn) for 'access permissions' is technically correct, but '访问权限' (fǎngwèn quánxiàn) would be more common and flow better in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change '授权您的{{productName}}帐户数据的访问权限' to '授权访问您的{{productName}}帐户数据'
